pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: New York Public Library for the Performing Arts, Dorothy and Lewis B. Cullman Center
pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Deems Taylor collection of broadcast recordings
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: The collection contains acetate and radio transcription disc recordings primarily of Taylor's spoken word radio programs dating from 1935 to 1954. Included are samples of his work on shows such as Information Please, Coronet, Swift's Studio Party, as well as special radio shows such as the ASCAP Cavalcade of Music, and memorial tributes to Stephen Vincent Benet and Jerome Kern.
